body:
Hi,


You may find some information regarding sky models, irradiance and 
illuminance calculations in my RADIANCE tutorial:
http://www.eif.ch/~compag/ref/RADIANCE_tutorial_E.pdf


Hope this will be useful for you.


Raphaël
